entry.title: Testing the Blog
entry.content: Just testing the blog functionality. I’ve used Jekyll before because of the ease of access and github pages support. I’ll likely never blog though, this is just a place for me to share what I’ve been working on.
entry.summary: Just testing the blog functionality. I’ve used Jekyll before because of the ease of access and github pages support. I’ll likely never blog though, this is just a place for me to share what I’ve been working on.
